short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Chrome extension with helpers to https://www.dndbeyond.com/.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This is a legacy version of Beyond Help Chrome extension. As the extension got discontinued this is a version for anyone that still want to use it as is. Unfortunately no future support will be given to this extension.
